import React from "react"; import { MDBCard, MDBCardBody, MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBTypography, MDBIcon, } from "mdb-react-ui-kit"; const WeatherCard = ({ location, time, temp, iconUrl, humidity, wind, pressure, }) => { return ( {/* Top - Location & Time */}
{location} {time}
{/* Middle Section */}
{/* Left - Temperature */}
{temp}Â°C
{/* Center - Icon */}
{/* Right - Metrics */}
{humidity}% Humidity
{wind} km/h Wind
{pressure} hPa
); }; export default WeatherCard;
